DEATHKNIGHT_FROST:
使用能量灌注在以下情况对冰霜死亡骑士施放：

  • 当冰柱效果激活，或未选择冰柱天赋时
  • 当选择湮灭天赋，或激活的辛达苟萨之息技能持续期间
  • 当未同时选择辛达苟萨之息与湮灭天赋时
DEATHKNIGHT_UNHOLY:
Use Power Infusion on the Unholy Deathknight when:

  • Their Summon Gargoyle is active and has 22 seconds or less remaining.
  • They have Army of the Dead talented and either Raise Abomination (active with less than 18 seconds remaining) or Army Ghouls (active with 18 seconds or less remaining) are present.
  • Dark Transformation is active, especially if they lack Gargoyle or Army of the Dead talents.
  • Fighting 3+ enemies while Dark Transformation is active or Death and Decay is damaging enemies.
  • Summon Gargoyle is unavailable and its cooldown exceeds Power Infusion’s duration by 10+ seconds.
DEMONHUNTER_HAVOC:
Use Power Infusion on the Havoc Demonhunter when:

  • The Demonhunter is currently in Metamorphosis form.
  • The encounter is in its final 20 seconds.
DRUID_BALANCE:
Use Power Infusion on the Balance Druid when:

  • They activate Celestial Alignment or Incarnation: Chosen of Elune to maximize their major cooldown window.
  • Their burst damage phase is aligned with Astral Power generation and offensive cooldowns like Convoke the Spirits or Warrior of Elune.
  • They are not movement-restricted and can fully utilize the haste buff for instant-cast abilities during their rotation.
DRUID_FERAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Feral Druid when:

  • The Feral Druid is under the effect of Berserk to amplify their burst window.
  • The Feral Druid has selected the Heart of the Lion talent, replacing Berserk, to compensate for their lack of a personal cooldown.
EVOKER_DEVASTATION:
Use Power Infusion on the Devastation Evoker when:

  • The Evoker's Dragonrage is active and Shattering Star is on cooldown
  • The Evoker's Dragonrage is active and the target is under Shattering Star's debuff
  • The Evoker's Dragonrage is active and there are 2 or more enemies
  • The remaining fight duration is less than 35 seconds
HUNTER_MARKSMANSHIP:
Use Power Infusion on the Marksmanship Hunter when:

  • The Hunter's Trueshot has more than 12 seconds remaining, ensuring full alignment with their major damage window.
  • The encounter is about to end within 13 seconds, allowing a final burst before combat concludes.
HUNTER_SURVIVAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Survival Hunter when:

  • The Hunter's Coordinated Assault is active.
  • The Hunter does not have the Coordinated Assault talent and Spearhead is off cooldown.
  • The Hunter has neither the Spearhead nor Coordinated Assault talents selected.
MAGE_ARCANE:
Use Power Infusion on the Arcane Mage when:

  • The Mage is not using Spymaster's Web and just cast Arcane Surge.
  • The Mage is using Spymaster's Web and just cast Evocation.
MAGE_FROST:
Use Power Infusion on the Frost Mage when:

  • The Frost Mage is using Icy Veins and Rune of Power to maximize their burst window.
  • Power Infusion is not currently active on them.
MONK_WINDWALKER:
Use Power Infusion on the Windwalker Monk when:

  • Xuen the White Tiger is active, and either:
  • Bloodlust is not active, or
  • Bloodlust is active and Strike of the Windlord is on cooldown
PALADIN_RETRIBUTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Retribution Paladin when:

  • Their Avenging Wrath ability is active, enhancing their damage output.
  • They are under the effect of Crusade, a talent replacing Avenging Wrath, during its duration.
  • The target is afflicted by the Execution Sentence debuff, amplifying the Paladin’s burst window.
PRIEST_SHADOW:
Use Power Infusion on the Shadow Priest when:

  • The target is in Voidform.
  • The target has Dark Ascension active.
  • They have the TWW2 4-piece set bonus equipped.
ROGUE_ASSASSINATION:
Use Power Infusion on the Assassination Rogue when:

  • The Rogue's Deathmark bleed effect is currently active on the target.
ROGUE_SUBTLETY:
Use Power Infusion on the Subtlety Rogue when:

  • the Rogue has Shadow Dance active, indicating they’re in a burst damage phase.
SHAMAN_ELEMENTAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Elemental Shaman when:

  • they are actively benefiting from Ascendance to amplify its burst window.
  • Ascendance is unavailable and its cooldown exceeds 30 seconds, ensuring alignment with other rotational cooldowns.
SHAMAN_ENHANCEMENT:
Use Power Infusion on the Enhancement Shaman when:

  • They activate Ascendance, Feral Spirit, or Doom Winds.
  • The encounter is in the final 20 seconds of a 2-minute window (aligns with burst phases).
  • Their major cooldowns have 120 seconds or more remaining, ensuring no overlap with future abilities.
  • They do not have Ascendance, Feral Spirit, or Doom Winds talented (default usage without key cooldowns).
WARLOCK_AFFLICTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Affliction Warlock when:

  • Their Summon Darkglare is active, as this aligns with their primary damage window.
  • They activate multiple offensive cooldowns simultaneously, such as Phantom Singularity or Rapid Infection (talent-dependent).
  • Their trinkets or racial abilities are triggered during a burst phase, maximizing Power Infusion value.
WARLOCK_DEMONOLOGY:
Use Power Infusion on the Demonology Warlock when:

  • They are casting Summon Demonic Tyrant and their Wild Imps are about to despawn within the next few seconds.
  • They have just used Hand of Gul'dan or Ruination to maximize demon uptime before summoning Tyrant.
  • Their Tyrant cast aligns with a critical timing window to extend high-priority demons like Imps before they expire.
WARLOCK_DESTRUCTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Destruction Warlock when:

  • their Summon Infernal is currently active.
  • they do not have the Summon Infernal talent selected.
  • the encounter will end before their next Summon Infernal cooldown (plus 10 seconds and Power Infusion’s duration) but lasts longer than Power Infusion’s effect.
  • the encounter will end within 15 seconds of their next Summon Infernal cooldown.
WARRIOR_ARMS:
Use Power Infusion on the Arms Warrior when:

  • The target is affected by Colossus Smash and the encounter will last at least 135 seconds longer.
  • The target is in Execute phase (below 20% health) and the Warrior has Avatar active.
  • The encounter will end within 25 seconds or less.
WARRIOR_FURY:
Use Power Infusion on the Fury Warrior when:

  • The Fury Warrior has Avatar active with over 15 seconds remaining and the encounter will last at least 135 more seconds.
  • The target is in Execute Phase (below 20% health) and Avatar is active.
  • The encounter will end within 25 seconds, regardless of other conditions.
